body:
Hi there, 
I've been making new videos for YouTube and using Final Cut Pro and Camtasia  to edit them. But I only have 9 days left (using trail version of it). I really like the animations of the Camtasia, and need it full. If you know how to make it full with some codes, please help me:)
body_tagged:

title: Need help about Camtasia - FOR MAC

replies.body: No idea, I think you need the activation key.
replies.body_tagged: No idea, I think you need the activation key.

replies.body: Pretty sure you can get cracked full-versions, I don't know the sites but you could find them.
